H0.text: The amount of water it absorbs is the trait that a cactus seedling inherits from its parents.

H1.text: The length of its spines is the trait that a cactus seedling inherits from its parents.

H2.text: The type of organism that pollinates its flowers is the trait that a cactus seedling inherits from its parents.

H3.text: The number of organisms that consume its fruit is the trait a cactus seedling inherits from its parents.
